name: SSW (GGJ2017)
description:
SSW is a device that detect and read spiritual sound waves from the past, try to find out what happened to this place.

Credit:

SSW done by Bug Games --- www.bug-games.com

as an entry for Global Game Jam 2017 --- www.globalgamejam.com

SSW Entry Page: http://globalgamejam.org/2017/games/ssw

Programmer: Danar Kayfi --- @DanarKayfi

Artist: Mohammad Al-Dmour --- @LightOfDarkness

Special Thanks to:

Jordan Gaming Lab (Jam Site) --- www.GamingLab.jo

Note: some SFX are from soundbible.com
